source.ffb510b6:
def cramers_v(x, y):
    x = np.array(x)
    y = np.array(y)
    confusion_matrix = pd.crosstab(x, y)
    chi2 = stats.chi2_contingency(confusion_matrix)[0]
    n = confusion_matrix.sum().sum()
    phi2 = chi2/n
    r,k = confusion_matrix.shape
    phi2corr = max(0, phi2-((k-1)*(r-1))/(n-1))
    rcorr = r-((r-1)**2)/(n-1)
    kcorr = k-((k-1)**2)/(n-1)
    return np.sqrt(phi2corr/min((kcorr-1),(rcorr-1)))


cramersv = pd.DataFrame(index=train_catagorical.columns,columns=train_catagorical.columns)
columns = train_catagorical.columns

for i in range(0,len(columns)):
    for j in range(0,len(columns)):
        #print(data[columns[i]].tolist())
        u = cramers_v(train_data[columns[i]].tolist(),train_data[columns[j]].tolist())
        cramersv.loc[columns[i],columns[j]] = u
        
cramersv.fillna(value=np.nan,inplace=True)
source.69fde485:
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(15,15))
sns.heatmap(cramersv, annot=True)
fig.savefig('catcorr.jpg', bbox_inches='tight', dpi=150)
plt.show()

source.541157b3: **Satisfaction is the response variable in this study. Around 56.7% passengers neutral or dissatisfied and around 43.3% passengers satisfied with airline services. Hence this dataset is a balance dataset and no need to use resampling techniques.**
source.51f693ca:
**

AIRLINE PASSENGER SATISFACTION

** **

DESCRIPTIVE ANALYSIS

**
source.ffe31757: Summary of Descriptive Analysis
source.bd9711da: There is correlation between Arrival Delay in Minutes and Departure Delay in Minutes.
source.465f61a1: Analysis of Gate location
source.92375051: Analysis of Food and drink
source.3526b356: The percentage of satisfied customers increases when the level of check-in services improve.Most Customers satisfied with cleanliness.When consider the inflight wifi service, satisfaction level 2 and 3 given passengers are higher than other levels. Most of passengers selected 3 to 5 levels in food and drink satisfaction. It means available food and drinks are much satisfied. Also, when consider the satisfaction and food and drink graph we can clearly see that most 4,5 level seletced passengers are satisfied with airline and most of 0 level selected passengers are neutral or dissatisfied with airline. In seat comfort satisfaction, most of passengers selected 3 to 5 levels. Most passengers who selected seat comfort level 4 and 5 are satisfied with airline.The passengers in bussiness class have a higher legroom satisfaction than economy and eco-plus classes. Mosrt of customers who selected onboard service satisfaction level 4 and 5 are satisfied with airline.
